Name: Fog Cutter (Bramble style)
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE cherry brandy over drink and serve with straws.
Review: A well-balanced (neither too strong nor too sweet), short, fruity drink which is reminiscent of the modern-day Bramble .
Nutrition: One serving of Fog Cutter (Bramble style) contains 182 calories
